calendar

Class StartMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • calendar.StartMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class StartMenu
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    StartMenu class This is the driver file for the Calendar app. The user will use the three menus to select a view type, a month, and a specific date. When the user hits submit,
    See Also:

      • toMainProgram

        public static void toMainProgram(java.lang.String view,
                                 java.lang.String month,
                                 int day)
        ToMainProgram takes the JcomboBox values as strings, converts the inputs into ints and returns the values to the respective viewtype class
        Parameters:
        month - represents months in an String form
        day - day represented as int
        view - is a string that determines which viewtype class will initialize
